name: The Magnificent Adventure
description:
This game was developed by Aaron Cohen & Amanda Kirk for the Get Along Jammit between Nov 9th & Nov 11th 2018 at the Tech Valley Center of Gravity (tvCOG) in Troy NY.

It was built using the Twine 2 tool which generates a HTML file which can be played in a web browser. Basic instructions are embedded within the game, which is played using a mouse or touchscreen to click hyperlinks.

We use a retro-futurist (Steampunk) setting, the goal of the game is to encourage cooperation between two self-interested parties who must work together to accomplish a goal that would not be achievable by each individually.
